phase.name: The Foundation (Core StackDock Shell)
phase.description: Establish the core infrastructure, authentication, billing, RBAC, and UI shell that serves as the foundation for all subsequent features

objectives: Initialize isolated repository with CodeRabbit integration
Extract and adapt core patterns from StackDock master plan
Implement authentication with Convex Auth and Clerk
Integrate Autumn billing with two-tier plan system
Build RBAC system with plan-based feature gating
Create navigation structure and UI shell with TanStack Start
Deploy to Netlify with Sentry error monitoring

external: StackDock master plan reference (local path only)

deliverables: Fully isolated repository with no cross-repo dependencies
CodeRabbit integrated and passing PR reviews
Convex schema with Organizations, Users, Projects
Autumn SDK integrated with two plans configured
RBAC system with plan-based feature access
TanStack Start app with top-level navigation routes
risks: Complexity extraction from master plan may take longer than expected
RBAC implementation may require iteration based on plan requirements
Netlify deployment configuration may need troubleshooting
successCriteria: Repository is completely isolated with no git dependencies
All sponsor technologies integrated and verified
Users can sign up, authenticate, and see the UI shell
Billing plans are configured and accessible
RBAC correctly gates features based on subscription status
